price: 30. En toen de waarheid tot hen kwam, zeiden zij: “Dit is toverij en wij geloven daar niet in.”
arabic: وَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ قَالُواْ هَٰذَا سِحۡرٞ وَإِنَّا بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: walammā jāahumu al-ḥaqu qālū hādhā siḥ'run wa-innā bihi kāfirūna
